name: Meringue
description: Use this meringue for the pastry chef Claudia Fleming's meringue-topped blood-orange curd cake. The topping can be toasted with a blowtorch or under a broiler for a baked alaska-like effect.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to a simmer. In a stainless-steel bowl, whisk together egg whites and both sugars. Place over simmering water, and whisk mixture constantly until hot to the touch. Remove from heat.
With an electric mixer set on high speed, whip mixture until stiff and shiny. Add orange extract, and whip an additional few seconds. Smooth over surface of cake.
